thread.title: With same core, Chicago Bulls hope new voice is difference
thread.title_full: With same core, Chicago Bulls hope new voice is difference

author: ANDREW SELIGMAN
title: With same core, Chicago Bulls hope new voice is difference
text:
Nam Y. Huh With same core, Chicago Bulls hope new voice is difference 
Chicago Bulls center/forward Joakim Noah (13) talks to guard E'Twaun Moore (55), forward/center Pau Gasol (16) and guard Jimmy Butler (21) during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game against the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh) Nam Y. Huh Big man Andre Drummond on the spot for young Pistons 
Chicago Bulls forward Taj Gibson, left, points after scoring a basket as Detroit Pistons center Andre Drummond looks to the bench during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game on Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh) Nam Y. Huh With same core, Chicago Bulls hope new voice is difference 
Chicago Bulls forward/center Pau Gasol, left, looks to a pass as Detroit Pistons forward Marcus Morris guards during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game on Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh) Posted: Friday, October 16, 2015 4:04 pm With same core, Chicago Bulls hope new voice is difference Associated Press | 
CHICAGO (AP) — Same core. New voice. 
The Chicago Bulls hope that makes all the difference as they take aim again at LeBron James and the Cleveland Cavaliers.
